Text: Did they not televise the full event?

It was televised on European Eurosport live but only the highlights were available the following day on British Eurosport.

You get better biathlon and cross-country coverage on European Eurosport satellite 19.2°E rather than British Eurosport on 28.2°E.

I tried asking Sky if my decoder card for 28.2°E would decode Eurosport on 19.2°E but they said no it wouldn't. You need a Sky card from France or Germany and you need a dish pointing at 19.2°E.

Take a look at the Kingsofsat website:
en.kingofsat.net/satellites.php
If you search for Eurosport at the kingsofsat website you'll see all the satellites carrying Eurosport streams. Some have English audio.
